author: Ina Fried
title: Apple gives Siri a less gendered voice
description: The new option is the latest in Apple's effort to provide a more diverse range of voices for Siri.
content:
With the latest version of iOS, currently in testing, Apple is offering a Siri voice that is less explicitly male- or female-sounding, Axios can confirm.
Why it matters: It's part of an effort by Apâ€¦ [+884 chars]
